Articles.Content:
Hey all!

I was wondering if there was a guide to the game in general somewhere? Like an instruction manual I guess.

Thanks

Well, the tutorial, of course. That helps a lot for things like basic controls and how to assemble parts. Otherwise there isn\'t an official guide, yet.

For getting off the pad and into orbit, there are a couple of tutorial videos mentioned in this thread:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=9566.0

Plenty more out there, too.

Keep looking around in this forum. I learn more every day just from the discussions.
